typeSystemDescription.name: TermSuiteTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: This Type System gathers Type Systems required by every UIMA CAS processors used within the fr.univnantes.termsuite.

featureDescription.name: pattern
featureDescription.description: The list of regex matcher labels (e.g. [N, A, A, C, A] )

featureDescription.name: ruleName
featureDescription.description: The unique name of the spotting rule matched
